title.description: The readable title of the mod.

description.description: A short description of the mod.

contributors.description: A list of contributors to the mod.

homepage.description: A link to the homepage for a mod (download URL).

api_version.description: Funkin API version number (e.g., '0.8.0'). Used for compatibility checks.

mod_version.description: Version number for the mod itself (Semantic Versioning).

license.description: The name of a license determining the terms of use.

metadata.description: Optional custom keys for application-specific information.

dependencies.description: Required mods that must be loaded first.

optionalDependencies.description: Mods that should be loaded after if they exist, but are not required.
